name: Project Parasite
description:
Hi, we are Team LIDSA and this is our Final Year Project, Project Parasite (Working Title). The game is still in early development and this is our alpha build.

The player plays as a captive that needs to escape this facility where an outbreak has occurred. The player needs to traverse the facility in order to figure out where they actually are and the way to get out of this place. 

Feel free to fill in the google form after playtesting it; for us to improve on it more, Thank your feedback: https://forms.gle/re2FcKAadwUAAwodA

Control: 
'W'= Move forward 
'A' = Move left
'S' = Move backwards
'D' = Move right
'Spacebar' = Jump
'Left Ctrl' = Crouch
'G' = Interact
'Esc' = Pause Game

When inspecting item:
'Left Mouse Click' = Rotate item
'Right Mouse Click' = Close item inspection

After obtaining the tablet:
'Tab' = Access tablet
'I' = Access inventory

After obtaining a flashlight:
'Right Mouse Click' = Turn on the flashlight

In Inventory:
-Click on the item slot = Use the item
-Click on the item slot's top right red button = Remove the item
